newsitem.title: UK: Citibank unit sets $798 million asset-backed bond.
newsitem.headline: Citibank unit sets $798 million asset-backed bond.

text.p: Citibank Credit Card Master Trust 1996-5 has issued a two-tranche asset-backed global bond for $798 million, lead manager Citibank said.
The deal has an expected maturity of September 15, 2003.
Class A notes total $750 million, and Class B notes total $48 million. Class B notes are lead managed by Merrill Lynch.
AMT $750 MLN SPREAD 10.5 BP EXP MAT 15.SEP.03
TYPE FRN BASE 3M LIBOR LEGAL MAT 15.SEP.05
LAST MOODY AAA ISS PRICE 99.9224 FULL FEES 32.5 BP
LAST S&P AAA PAY DATE 29.AUG.96 DENOMS (K) ONE
NOTES FIRST COUPON DECEMBER 16, LONG FIRST COUPON
AMT $48 MLN SPREAD 28 BP EXP MAT 15.SEP.03
TYPE FRN BASE 3M LIBOR LEGAL MAT 15.SEP.05
LAST MOODY A2 ISS PRICE 99.952 FULL FEES 35 BP
LAST S&P A PAY DATE 29.AUG.96 DENOMS (K) ONE
NOTES FIRST COUPON DECEMBER 16, LONG FIRST COUPON
